subject: Soccer

Corruption (Institutional)
World Cup 2018 (Soccer)
World Cup 2022 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The official leading the inquiry in Switzerland said about nine terabytes of data had been seized during a sweep of the Zurich offices of world soccer’s governing body.
snippet: The official leading the inquiry in Switzerland said about nine terabytes of data had been seized during a sweep of the Zurich offices of world soccer’s governing body.
